LanguageData.Backstory_Mayinas_Exploriter.title: 探解者
LanguageData.Backstory_Mayinas_Exploriter.baseDescrip: 探解者[PAWN_nameDef]。[PAWN_pronoun]即是最终制作。[PAWN_pronoun]的作者是[PAWN_pronoun]自己。
LanguageData.CentaurCivil_Laborer.title: Laborer
LanguageData.CentaurCivil_Laborer.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as general laborer, assisting in the construction and demolition of buildings in urban centres and getting into brawls after work regularly.
LanguageData.CentaurCivil_Procession.title: Processionist
LanguageData.CentaurCivil_Procession.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] fondly recalls their days on a glitterworld, covered in neon lights and fireworks as they lead celebratory parades for the local dictator.
LanguageData.CentaurCivil_Mercenary.title: Processionist
LanguageData.CentaurCivil_Mercenary.baseDescription: There's nothing better than killing for [PAWN_nameDef], and so the life of a career mercenary suited them just fine.
LanguageData.CentaurCivil_Lobotomite.title: Lobotomite
LanguageData.CentaurCivil_Lobotomite.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was just one of many centaurs abducted for scientific experimentation. Portions of [PAWN_possessive] brain removed and altered, [PAWN_pronoun] has made most complex tasks downright impossible to focus on.
LanguageData.CentaurCivil_Scout.title: Centaur scout
LanguageData.CentaurCivil_Scout.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] found themselves a part of a rimworld scouting regiment, hooves thundering across all variety of landscape. Every scout showed some competency in both combat and foraging, or alternatively being a corpse.
LanguageData.CentaurCivil_Medic.title: Centaur medic
LanguageData.CentaurCivil_Medic.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] served as a medical outrider for centaur based rimworld expeditions.
LanguageData.CentaurCivil_Police.title: Urbworld cop
LanguageData.CentaurCivil_Police.baseDescription: Acting as law enforcement on an urbworld taught [PAWN_nameDef] the value of a quick shot. It also left [PAWN_pronoun] paranoid.
LanguageData.CentaurCivil_RacingCentaur.title: Race centaur
LanguageData.CentaurCivil_RacingCentaur.baseDescripti: [PAWN_nameDef] was bred for speed, racing in both underground and public tracks.
LanguageData.CentaurCivil_BeastOfBurden.title: Beast of burden
LanguageData.CentaurCivil_BeastOfBurden.baseDescripti: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up on a medieval world, serving as a beast of burden on farmland.
LanguageData.CentaurCivil_VatSoldier.title: Vatgrown soldier
LanguageData.CentaurCivil_VatSoldier.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was vat grown, part of a line of military centaurs.
LanguageData.CentaurCivil_EngineeredToy.title: Engineered toy
LanguageData.CentaurCivil_EngineeredToy.baseDescripti: [PAWN_nameDef] was engineered to be a plaything for a glitterworld elite's child. [PAWN_pronoun] was promptly abandoned when no longer "cute".
LanguageData.CentaurCivil_JellyBean.title: Jellybean mascot
LanguageData.CentaurCivil_JellyBean.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a child star on a glitterworld, promoting the sales of jellybeans.
